# function: tocidr

Given subnet and netmask, return subnet and netmask in the cidr format. Fails for invalid subnet or netmasks.

## Example Usage

```terraform
output "cidr" {
  value = provider::foxfunx::tocidr("10.10.10.0", "255.255.255.0")
}

# returns 10.10.10.0/24
```

## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
tocidr(subnet string, netmask string) string
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `subnet` (String) Network subnet
1. `netmask` (String) Network mask
